page.title: 11Bank Holiday in Gt.Broughton
page.content: Today my alarm woke me up as I had just started to nod off. Pulling back my sheets, I stumbled out of bed, went downstairs in my nightie and opened the door to the kitchen. A sunny{Monday morning}met my eyes. A piece of toast popped out the toaster which I buttered and ate. Upstairs I went and changed into my jeans and jumper. Normally I would put on my school clothes but today there was no school. Downstairs I packed a picnic. 11.00 and we were picked up to go to the point_to_point. Passing Burtree Caravan Centre,we turned into the road,and saw people eating lollies which made me feel hungry. Inside at last with food and drink in front of me. The voice of the man on the mircophone boomed out. After the races, we looked at the car boot sale. Then the journey home was set ahead.
